items.description: Celebrate the season with this year’s essential summer tracks.
items.label: 2020 Summer Hits

items.description: Explore Quebec’s diverse Indigenous music, which features both traditional and contemporary songs from the province’s many Indigenous artists.
items.label: Indigenous Music: Quebec

items.description: Discover the best English music coming out of Quebec! This mix of all genres is a celebration of great Quebec artists.
items.label: Today's English Quebec

items.description: Explore Canada’s diverse Indigenous music, which features both traditional and contemporary songs from the nation’s many Indigenous artists.
items.label: Indigenous Music: Canada

items.description: Bleu Jeans Bleu, Québécois group of the year at the 2019 ADISQ Gala, takes center stage in curating their fun music channel. Discover their favourite tracks and top hits, including the irresistible “Coton Ouaté.”
items.label: Bleu Jeans Bleu

items.description: Turn up country music's hottest summer anthems. These tracks are the perfect addition to your summertime BBQ.
items.label: Hot Country Summer

items.description: Celebrate Canadian talent with our pick of the country’s top 100 songs!
items.label: Top 100 Canadian Songs of All-Time

items.description: This folk-heavy mix is the perfect sing-along companion for your campfire gathering. The crowd-pleasing oldies will bring you down memory lane, all the while creating new unforgettable moments with family and friends.
items.label: Campfire Singalong

items.description: Discover the world of Afrobeats, the sound of contemporary African pop music. Get lost in the signature drum beat rhythms and dance the night away.
items.label: Afrobeats

items.description: American Idol judge and country super star, Luke Bryan, curates a channel like you've never heard. Listen to Jon Pardi, Lizzo, Kane Brown, Diplo, and Luke's newest and biggest hits, like “Drunk on You,” and “Play it Again.”
items.label: Luke Bryan

items.description: This sunny mix of chill soul music, old and new, is the soundtrack you need to take a break from fast-paced living.
items.label: Sunrise Soul

items.description: The Official Canada Day channel brings together talented Canadian artists participating in the Canada Day national shows.
items.label: Canada: Together in Music
